name: Smartwool Sneaker Striped No Show Socks - Women's
description: No one knows how comfy your feet are. These no-show socks are made with a merino wool blend and seamless construction to keep your feet happy all day.Shred Shield™ reinforced toe cap adds durability.Internal heel gripper and arch brace hold sock securely in place.Virtually Seamless™ toe won't cause hotspots or chafing.Slightly more coverage than standard no-show for added comfort.Narrower profile suits those with narrower feet.
